description: If you need to understand who consumers are and the major characteristics of their lifestyles, this is the book to consult! World Consumer Lifestyles Databook 2008 offers a wealth of country comparable data across 71 countries. You can research lifestyle characteristics including eating and drinking habits, consumer and family expenditure, and leisure habits. Key Benefits and Features: Data span 13 years, allowing you to understand how lifestyles have changed in the last decade Unique rankings show the relative position of a country to another Comparable data makes it easy to examine similarities and differences in lifestyles across nationalities Find hundreds of lifestyle statistics for 71 countries Reasons to buy this book: Statistics are comparable across countries and years Provides data on consumers that would otherwise be costly, time consuming and difficult to o
title: World Consumer Lifestyles Databook
